meanings.definition: The arrangement of young leaves in a bud before they unfold.
meanings.sent1: The vernations of the plant buds were tightly packed together.
meanings.sent2: The gardener studied the vernations of the new leaves to understand their growth pattern.
meanings.sent3: The curious squirrel inspected the vernations of the tree buds, trying to guess when they would open.
meanings.sent4: The vernations of the rose bush resembled a tightly woven tapestry waiting to be revealed.
meanings.sent5: The intricate vernations of the fern leaves unfurled like delicate origami creations.

meanings.definition: The way in which leaves are arranged in a bud.
meanings.sent1: The vernations of the flower buds showed a spiral pattern.
meanings.sent2: Botanists use microscopes to study the vernations of different plant species.
meanings.sent3: The artist painted the vernations of the tree buds in vibrant colors, creating a unique masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: The vernations of the succulent buds were like a secret code waiting to be deciphered.
meanings.sent5: The intricate vernations of the maple tree buds were a mesmerizing sight in the morning light.
